column2: Develop/Execute content strategies in collaboration with your cross-functional partners in publicity, marketing, social, product and content, and align with the creative needs of the title      Leverage your editorial and creative expertise to solve business opportunities through authentic visual storytelling and compelling creatives (audio-visual and photo assets)      Be responsible for the best use of talent time during production to meet the creative needs of the campaign. Drive communication from the set to key stakeholders      Innovate and build engaging narratives that tell the story behind the story. Conduct in-depth interviews with on-screen and off-screen talent to uncover and shape narratives that elevate the campaign     Read scripts, and plan, hire and supervise unit photographers and video crews to capture the best on-set creative. Business-level fluency in English is preferred. Fluency in Indian regional languages is a plus.

column2: Completes moderately complex Photoshop work (e.g. matches the color of one file to another, cuts silhouette paths, creates detailed, complex selections, and makes selective color adjustments using layers in Photoshop), in a timely manner.          Cuts paths with fine detail, makes shadows and accurately edits color by eye and/or using color data readings          Manages files, including renaming, resizing, layer organization and file archiving          Communicates clearly with team to verify individual image tasks and needs          Reviews peer assignments to ensure that they meet department standards          Completes assignments in a timely manner with minimal need for second-round alterations          Takes the initiative to lead projects and drive them forward to completion          Maintains accurate records of time spent on assignments using in-house traffic software          Actively contributes to projects and meetings, suggests new ways of improving product presentation          Clearly documents and updates client processes and guidelines          Works directly with clients to address ongoing imaging need.      JOB REQUIREMENTS      Minimum 5 years of Photoshop work (CS6 or later) in a professional environment          Must have a thorough understanding of monitor calibration, color profiles and basic color management          Must have experience editing color and retouching digital images on a commercial basis          Independent worker who produces consistent, high-quality image work          Superior attention to detail          Proven project management skills with the ability to handle numerous projects at once          Ability to think creatively and problem solve on the fly          Proficient in Mac-based operating systems (OS 10.8 or later)          Strong adherence to deadlines with minimal supervision          Experience with Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint          Must be a team player with a positive, can-do attitude; someone who is able to shift gears quickly.

column2: Photo Editor  Responsibilities:Creating image clipping path and maskingRetouching jewelry photos and modeling portraitsEnhancing and blending real estate picturesIndividual will be responsible for qualityMust have ability to achieve goal or daily target within time Job Requirements:Minimum 2 years experience in similar fieldSound knowledge of Photoshop -  latest versionGood oral and written communication skillsShould be able to do projects as independentShould be flexible to work in shifts Experience : 2+ years Qualification : Graduate

work in collaboration with the photo department to help execute a major photo archival project. They work on archival research and data entry, helping to organise and catalogue the photographic records of Delhi Press s extensive archives. Photo interns are also given the opportunity to learn about magazine production and picture research for story assignments.   Note: This internship is primarily a research and archiving position and does not offer opportunities to conduct shoots, as The Caravan does not have any staff photographers. Selected applicants may get opportunities to assist staff writers for Vantage, The Caravan s web section, with the shoots for their stories in and around Delhi. However, they must be aware that these opportunities are rare and not the prime mandate of the internship.   The internship is full - time from 11 am to 7 pm, Monday through Saturday. Interns will be paid a stipend. The Caravan requires a two - month commitment from photo interns, and accepts applications on a rolling basis. The ability to speak Hindi will be an advantage to a candidate s application.   Please be sure to note Photo Internship in the subject line of your email. All materials must be submitted in English.   If you have any questions regarding the internship, kindly write to the same email address with your queries.

column2: Job Description: We are seeking a skilled Graphic Designer who specialises in Product Image editing. In this role, you will be responsible for enhancing and optimising product images for our Amazon and other e-commerce platform. While this position may involve some repetitive tasks, it offers a unique opportunity to work with a variety of home decor products and develop essential e-commerce design skills. Responsibilities: Edit and enhance product images, such as white background & lifestyle images, ensuring they meet quality standards and Amazon's guidelines. Create detailed images showcasing product features and benefits. Design functional and informative graphics, such as info-graphics, EBC images and so on to accompany product listings. Collaborate with the team to ensure the highest level of image quality and consistency. Adapt to a high-volume workload, with a focus on maintaining quality and accuracy. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in fine arts (BFA) or diploma in Graphic Design and Visual Communication Design. Specializing in design software, such as Photoshop, Lightroom, InDesign and Illustrator. Strong skills in layout design and photo retouching, such as colour correction, image manipulation, and cutouts. Good understanding of design principles, color theory, and composition. Attention to details and an eye for visual aesthetics. Strong sense of responsibility and willing to learn. Graphic design experience for the Amazon platform or Amazon third-party sellers is a plus, preferably in the furniture category. Openness to repetitive tasks while maintaining high-quality standards. Ability to meet deadlines while ensuring quality. Good English Communication Skills ( Must) What We Offer: Exposure to a wide range of home decor products. The opportunity to work with a dynamic and collaborative team., Training and support to ensure success in e-commerce design. Competitive compensation and growth opportunities. Please include your resume and design portfolio. Note- This is onsite role in Gurugram & we are working on alternate Saturdays.
column11: Product Design, Image Editing, Retouching, Photoshop, Color Correction, Lifestyle, Photo Editing, Graphic Designing

column2: We are seeking a creative photo editor / Image Editor who has good experience in the fashion and Entertainment industry. To be successful as a photo editor, you should demonstrate experience in photo editing, an eye for detail, and the ability to align your creative ideas.       Photo Editor Responsibilities:         Procures and manipulates photos/ images to achieve the highest quality using the appropriate tools         Tracking assignment progress to ensure all tasks remain on schedule         Reviewing and editing photos according to organizational goals, guidelines, and specifications         Submitting photographs for approval promptly.         Extensive experience in coordinating photography projects and meeting deadlines, obtaining feedback, and making relevant changes, when required.         Should have experience in Retouching, Color correction, lightroom, color grading, Etc.         Photo Editor Requirements:         Bachelors or associate degree in photography, visual arts, or similar.         Fashion photo and Entertainment editing experience required.         Advanced proficiency in photograph editing software, such as Lightroom, Photoshop, or similar.         Proficiency in keeping up with photography trends and related technologies.         Excellent communication skills.
